# Learning Objectives

- Use weights from free models on your local machine.
- Ollama: <https://ollama.com/>
- Ellmer and ollama: <https://ellmer.tidyverse.org/reference/chat_ollama.html>
- rollama: <https://cran.r-project.org/package=rollama>

# Motivation

- Why free?
  - Don't have to pay.
  - Extra privacy.
- Why not free
  - Generally worse performance
